snippet: The New York Knicks routed city rivals Brooklyn 110-81 to move a step closer to a postseason berth on Wednesday, a day after the Nets had celebrated clinching a playoff berth of their own....

headline.print_headline: Knicks Beat City Rivals Nets to Help Playoff Drive
headline.main: Knicks Beat City Rivals Nets to Help Playoff Drive

lead_paragraph: The New York Knicks routed city rivals Brooklyn 110-81 to move a step closer to a postseason berth on Wednesday, a day after the Nets had celebrated clinching a playoff berth of their own.
